Common.Highlight.Common.Text: 45-Story Class A Trophy office building containing 1.01M SF
840 car attached garage with integral access to an additional 1,600 spaces at the Boulevard of the Allies’ garage and former Macy’s garage.
Chase Bank branch, multiple ATM machines and Starbucks located in the lobby
Food-hall located in the lower level along with the Bar Oxford; outdoor seating available
U.S. Postal Service, UPS and FedEx

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in the CDB with easy access to public transit and multiple garages.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 45-Story Class A Trophy office building containing 1.01M SF
